  • Uses of Card in cards

    Subclasses of Card in cards
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ColorCard
    A concrete class that simulates a Card with a color in the form of a String Contains method playable to determine playability of Card and equals to determine whether two ColorCards are the same
    class 
    DrawFourCard
    A Card that forces the next Player to draw four Cards when played and skips their turn Playable regardless of previous Card Sets color after played
    class 
    DrawTwoCard
    A card that forces the next player to draw two cards and skips their turn Playable if color or effect matches previous card
    class 
    NumberCard
    An instance of a ColorCard with an additional number property Playable if color or number matches previous card
    class 
    ReverseCard
    A Card that reverses the current order in which Players play Playable if color or effect matches previous Card
    class 
    SkipCard
    A Card that forces the next Player to skip their turn Playable when color or effect matches previous card
    class 
    SpecialColorCard
    A class that extends ColorCard with an additional field for the effect in order to simulate Cards that have special effects when played Overrides playable and equals to accomodate for said effect
    class 
    WildCard
    A Card that can be played at any time and sets color to Player's choice after played

    Card.playable​(Card card)

    Determines whether or not Card is playable based on previously played Card

    NumberCard.playable​(Card card)
    Determines if Card is playable based on previously played Card Card is playable if color or number matches
    boolean

    Determines if SpecialColorCard is playable based on previously played Card
